A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Life long Star Wars fan.  Saw the Last Jedi last night and left the movie confused and became angry the more I thought about the movie.  Millions of people have been waiting to see Luke as a aged Jedi Master since 1983 and Disney and Rian Johnson basically nutered him and kicked sand in the face of every fan who waited 20+ years for this moment to come.  Moreover\, I guess Disney decided it would be fun (and profitable?) to literally dispense with every plot thread created in Force Awakens in the glibbest fasion I can remember seeing.  This filim is a disrespectful money grab that expressly wants to kill Star Wars' past so that it can promote the new characters\, who are so poorly devloped (and acted in my opinion) that I cannot seeing caring about them or the next movie they will headline.  Keep youtr money folks and ingnore the reviews.  I am not much for conspiracy theories\, but if 93% of critics rate the Last Jedi as fresh\, 93% of critics must be on Disney's payroll.
